dict.string: if [[ ! -f "$TM_NEW_FILE" ]]; then TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` \ TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` \ TM_USERNAME=`niutil -readprop / /users/\$USER realname` \ #$DIALOG /Users/coderanger/Documents/setuppy.nib res="$(CocoaDialog standard-inputbox --informative-text "Name of plugin" --title "New Plugin")" [[ "$(head -n1 <<<"$res")" == "2" ]] && exit_discard export PLUGIN_NAME="$(tail -n1 <<<"$res")" export MODULE_NAME="$(tr "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]" <<<"$PLUGIN_NAME")" mkdir "$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/$MODULE_NAME" touch "$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/$MODULE_NAME/__init__.py" perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' \ < template.py > "$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
